attributes.action: Resolve Brexit DEAL deadlock democratically, ask British people TO VOTE ON DEAL.
attributes.background: With difficult / near impossible Brexit Deal situation for Government & PM, nearly 3 years on, it is time to Give the BRITISH PEOPLE A further VOTE ON THE DEAL ASAP. This should resolve it for once & for all, as even a general election will not resolve this matter.

rejection.details:
We can't accept your petition because we aren't sure what you mean by a vote on the deal.

If you want a referendum between the deal and remain you could sign this petition:

https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/235138

If you want a referendum between the deal and no deal you could sign this petition:

https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/232882
